Package gg.acai.aurora

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccuracySupplier
    An Accuracy supplier for the purpose of testing the accuracy of a neural network
    Clusterer
    A clusterer marker interface.
    Display
    A display of data, such as a graph.
    NeuralNetwork
    A neural network that can be trained and evaluated, and can be converted into a storable model.
    SavePoint
    A save point for model saving.
    Serializer
    A serializable object.
    TimeEstimator<T>
    A time estimator for estimating the time remaining.
    Tokenizer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNeuralNetwork
    An abstract neural network implementation.
    Aurora
    A class for Aurora specific information.
    GsonSpec
    A Gson specification for Aurora.
    NeuralNetworkBuilder
    Builder class for the NeuralNetworkTrainer Example Usage: Building a Neural Network NeuralNetworkTrainer trainer = new NeuralNetworkBuilder() .name("my_model") .learningRate(0.1) .epochs(1_000_000) .optimizer(new StochasticGradientDescent()) // most common optimizer .earlyStops(new Stagnation(20)) // in case stagnation happens, we will stop training to prevent unnecessary training .printing(Bar.CLASSIC) .activationFunction(ActivationFunction.SIGMOID) .epochActions(new EpochAutoSave(10_000, "C:\\Users\\my_user\\models")) // every 10K epochs .layers(mapper -> mapper .inputLayers(3) // add your input layer size here .hiddenLayers(3) // add your hidden layer size here .outputLayers(1)) // add your output layer size here .build(); trainer.train(inputs, outputs); // train the neural network
    NeuralNetworkBuilder.LayerMapper  
    NeuralNetworkModel
    A storable and loadable neural network model.
    NeuralNetworkTrainer
    Example Usage: Building a Neural Network NeuralNetworkTrainer trainer = new NeuralNetworkBuilder() .name("my_model") .learningRate(0.1) .epochs(1_000_000) .optimizer(new StochasticGradientDescent()) .earlyStops(new Stagnation(20)) // in case stagnation happens, we will stop training to prevent unnecessary training .printing(Bar.CLASSIC) .activationFunction(ActivationFunction.SIGMOID) .epochActions(new EpochAutoSave(10_000, "C:\\Users\\my_user\\models")) // every 10K epochs .layers(mapper -> mapper .inputLayers(3) // add your input layer size here .hiddenLayers(3) // add your hidden layer size here .outputLayers(1)) // add your output layer size here .build(); trainer.train(inputs, outputs); // train the neural network
    QRMath
    Various mathematical functions that are used throughout Aurora.
    SimpleTokenizer  
    test  
    TrainingStats
    A stats accumulator for the purpose of training a neural network
    Vec2D
    Vec2D is a 2-dimensional Vector, holding two arrays of doubles, x and y.
    WrappedNeuralNetwork
    A wrapped neural network for the purpose of saving and loading or transferring between models
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeEstimator.Time
